root.label: Override the root directory for the android build (which contains the android directory)

appFolder.label: Specify a different application folder name for the android source.

appId.label: Specify an applicationId to launch after build.

appIdSuffix.label: Specify an applicationIdSuffix to launch after build.

main-activity.label: Name of the activity to start

deviceId.label: builds your app and starts it on a specific device/simulator with the given device id (listed by running "adb devices" on the command line).

no-packager.label: Do not launch packager while building

config.label: Path to the CLI configuration file
